captions.text:
"Improbable Reconstruction",
everybody plays, stand up.
Marcio, you're dead.

I want an object from you.
A sticker?

What kind of sticker?
A cartoon sticker.

Now you in the middle, I want
another non-lethal object...
A party horn?
Another non-lethal object, please...

- Toothpaste!
- Toothpaste! Okay?

So we have a body and three objects.
'A cartoon sticker'.

We have a 'party horn'
and a 'toothpaste'.

And you have to
figure out how he died.

This is "Improbable Reconstruction",
starting now!

I didn't believe it when I heard it,
another death in this town.

It's getting more and more
dangerous to live here.

- Look at that.
- What?
A party horn.

- Party horns are very dangerous...
- I know what happened.

- Explain it to me..
- He had a birthday party to go to.

- Of course, we all have to go to birthday parties.
- It was his mother-in-law's party.

Oh, my God, my son-in-law is the only
one who hasn't arrived! Oh, joy!

When she opened the door,
she made her famous salute,
the one she always gave him.

Son-in-law! Son-in-law!
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!

- Oh, my God! - He gave her
the party horn right away...

- She didn't like the joke!
- She got jealous,

because it's known as 'mother-in-law's
tongue' and she already had one.

- And she let her jealousy show!
- Something like that!
Wow, your jealousy is showing!

- Stop it, it's no big deal...
- So she, in a fit of jealousy...

- Threw the party horn at his head...
- Never mind, you don't have to...

- And he dropped dead! - Just so you know...
I'm jealous of my own tongue!

And the body miraculously travelled
from her house to this place.

- What is this next to his head?
- Oh, my God! Oh, my God!

Oh, my God!
It's a toothbrush!

- It's a toothpaste!
- Calm down! This one is mine.

- Is it yours?
- It fell...

So how do you explain
this paste I found here?

- I'm confused, is it toothpaste or
toothbrush? - You're a suspect now!

- How can I be a suspect?
- I know what happened!

- So, what happened?
- You were...

At the dentist's
waiting room, with him!

- Hey, how are you?
- Hey, what's up?

- That's when he started to talk
to you, wasn't it? - Yes. Dammit.

- So, the weather is cloudy and hot,
that's weird, isn't it? - Yeah, kinda.

You had been waiting for 66 hours,
which is normal for a dentist appointment.

The assistant called a
number, but it wasn't yours.

- 37.
- Motherfucker!

But before number 37 got in,
he remembered to brush his teeth.

Which happens all the time, we only brush
our teeth when we go to the dentist.

- I'll brush them and I'll be right back!
- Please, hurry!

- So what did I do, smart ass?
- Smart ass?

While he brushed his teeth,
you saw his toothpaste and...

- He was allergic to toothpaste!
- I'm allergic to this shit!

- And he dropped dead, agonizing!
- I'll celebrate!

- You have no proof that this ever happened!
- Funny thing, he died differently now.
Oh, the famous postmortem spasms!

- I'll take you to the precinct, kid!
- Wait!

Wait for what?
This isn't a game!

How can I be a suspect if there's
something else next to the body?

- I don't see anything else.
- That's because it's under his shirt!

He was using a
Lottie Dottie Chicken sticker!

A Lottie Dottie Chicken
sticker, a toothbrush...

- Toothpaste! - Toothpaste... You
brought this in, now you have to use it!

A toothbrush, a toothpaste
and a party horn, like you said!

- I know what happened!
- Good!

He was with his son, and it was time
to teach him how to brush his teeth!

Benjamim, today you'll learn how to
brush your teeth with your daddy!

- I wanna watch Lottie Dottie Chicken!
- But before Lottie Dottie Chicken...

- Lottie Dottie Chicken! - Do you
know what Lottie Dottie Chicken does?
I'll send you back to your mother!

Dad was smart, and went to
Lottie Dottie Chicken's website

and saw a video that teached
children to brush their teeth!

Look! A Lottie Dottie Chicken video
teaching Mr. Cock to brush his teeth!

That's when a Lottie Dottie Chicken
song started to play!

And the child began
to sing right away!

Brush the cock, brush the cock, hey hey hey
Brush the cock, brush the cock, no more decay

Brush the cock, brush the cock, hey hey hey
Brush the cock, brush the cock, no more decay

Decay makes your teeth hollow,
how can the cock swallow

Then, the song stopped!
The song stopped!

The video wasn't loading anymore!
Youtube went offline that day!

He then pretended he was
Lottie Dottie Chicken!

The father was pretending
to be Lottie Dottie Chicken?

- Yes, he put stickers!
- I wanna see that!

- An egg! Yay!
- Dad, you're ridiculous!

You can't fool a child!
So the child got angry with his dad.

Even the party horn and the Lottie
Dottie Chicken stickers were useless,
and, in a fit of rage...
The child, in a fit of rage...

- Took his father down!
- Take this!

And, in a fit of rage,
he took the toothbrush...
Took the toothpaste...

- Put it just like Lottie Dottie Chicken taught...
- All right, you're going to brush!

- And shoved it!
- Brush the cock, brush the cock!
And that's how he died!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

- Change!
- My osteoarthritis!
Lottie Dottie Chicken!
